author: smilek
msg: The following revision comments are from branches/JETSPEED-2.1.3 revisions which were not individually checked-in to trunk
[ from branches/JETSPEED-2.1.3 r595431 ] | smilek | 2007-11-15 13:21:24 -0700 (Thu, 15 Nov 2007) | 1 line
major improvements to desktop page editor (UI, config options, flow, no action layouts); support for create-new-page-on-edit
[ from branches/JETSPEED-2.1.3 r588437 ] | smilek | 2007-10-25 18:17:28 -0600 (Thu, 25 Oct 2007) | 1 line
added loading property content; changed <link> tag insertion to prevent adding portlet decorator stylesheets
[ from branches/JETSPEED-2.1.3 r584856 ] | smilek | 2007-10-15 13:17:44 -0600 (Mon, 15 Oct 2007) | 1 line

added support for contructing portlet decorator override properties object (djConfig.jetspeed.portletDecorationsProperties) - this replaces <decorator-name>.js file, which was previously loaded for each portlet decorator to obtain override properties
[ from branches/JETSPEED-2.1.3 r584011 ] | smilek | 2007-10-11 18:47:48 -0600 (Thu, 11 Oct 2007) | 1 line
added cache for localized desktop text labels
